General.Name: Wolong Real Estate Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Wolong Resources Group Co., Ltd. engages in the real estate development business in China. The company was formerly known as Wolong Real Estate Group Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Wolong Resources Group Co., Ltd. in May 2023. Wolong Resources Group Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shaoxing, China.
